name: $::type
desc: Returns: The type of channel to send notifications on.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The type of channel to send notifications on.

name: $endpoint
desc: Returns: The url that describes the actual end-point to send messages to.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The url that describes the actual end-point to send messages to.

name: $payload
desc: Returns: The mime type to send the payload in - either application/fhir+xml, or application/fhir+json. If the payload is not present, then there is no payload in the notification, just a notification. The mime type "text/plain" may also be used for Email and SMS subscriptions.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The mime type to send the payload in - either application/fhir+xml, or application/fhir+json. If the payload is not present, then there is no payload in the notification, just a notification. The mime type "text/plain" may also be used for Email and SMS s

name: $header
desc: Returns: Additional headers / information to send as part of the notification.

name: $addheader
desc: Additional headers / information to send as part of the notification.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Additional headers / information to send as part of the notification.
